name: Stickman Ninja War 3D
description:
CREATE CHARACTER:
- Create Ninja heroes with outfits, transform, skills and ultimate at will.
- Unlock and choose your favorite ninja to head to battle.

HOW TO PLAY:
Stickman Ninja War with more stick ninja, ultimate skills, more intense combat and martial arts.
The gameplay gets more challenging, allows you to discover the world of all ninja, to the road of a stickman ninja!

VS MODE:
- Choose your stickman ninja and fight.
- Test power and skill with your stick ninja.

BATTLE MODE:
- Challenge: Battle 3 vs 3 to pass through so many round to victory.
After each round, the bosses are more dangerous later.

- Survival: with 3 ninja , fight against monster, and shinobi troops.

- Tournament: 20 shinobi in battle royale and only one winner.
